ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc85:0.5_0: The training rule on entering an inhabited area
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc85:1.1_0: At one time when the Buddha was staying at Sāvatthī in Anāthapiṇḍika’s Monastery,
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc85:1.2_0: At that time the monks from the group of six entered the village at the wrong time, sat down in the public meeting hall, and talked about all sorts of pointless things:
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc85:1.3_0: talk about kings, bandits, and ministers; talk about armies, threats, and wars; talk about food, drink, clothes, and beds; talk about garlands and fragrances; talk about family, vehicles, villages, towns, cities, and countries; talk about women and heroes; street talk and well talk; talk about the departed; motley talk; tales of land and sea; and talk about being reborn in this or that state of existence.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc85:1.4_0: People complained and criticized the monks,
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc85:1.5_0: “How can the Sakyan ascetics act like this?
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc85:1.6_0: talk about kings, bandits, and ministers ...
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc85:1.7_0: They are just like householders who indulge in worldly pleasures!”
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc85:1.8_0: The monks heard the complaints of those people
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc85:1.9_0: The monks of few desires complained and criticized Udāyī,
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc85:1.10_0: “How can the monks from the group of six do this?”
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc85:1.11_0: talk about kings, bandits, and ministers ...
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc85:1.12_0: They spoke ill of continued existence; or that is how there are future lives.”
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc85:1.13_0: “Is it true, monks, that you do this?”
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc85:1.14_0: talk about kings, bandits, and ministers ...
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc85:1.15_0: or talk about profit and loss.”
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc85:1.18_0: “... Foolish men, how can you do this?
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc85:1.19_0: talk about kings, bandits, and ministers ...
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc85:1.20_0: or talk about profit and loss.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc85:1.21_0: This won’t give rise to confidence in those without it ...” ...
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc85:1.22_0: “And, monks, this training rule should be recited like this:
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc85:1.23.1_0: ‘If a monk enters an inhabited area at the wrong time, he commits an offense entailing confession.’”
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc85:1.24_0: In this way the Buddha laid down this training rule for the monks.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc85:2.1_0: On one occasion a number of monks were walking through the Kosalan country on their way to Sāvatthī, when one evening they arrived at a certain village.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc85:2.5_0: But knowing that entering a village at the wrong time had been prohibited by the Buddha and being afraid of wrongdoing, they declined.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc85:2.7_0: They then went to Sāvatthī and told the monks what had happened,
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc85:2.8_0: They in turn told the Buddha.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc85:2.9_0: After giving a teaching, the Buddha addressed the monks:
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc85:2.10_0: “Monks, I allow you to enter an inhabited area at the wrong time after taking leave.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc85:2.11_0: “And, monks, this training rule should be recited like this:
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc85:2.12.1_0: ‘If a monk, without taking leave, enters an inhabited area at the wrong time, he commits an offense entailing confession.’”
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc85:2.13_0: In this way the Buddha laid down this training rule for the monks.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc85:3.1_0: Soon afterwards a monk was walking through the Kosalan country toward Sāvatthī, when one evening he came to a certain village.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc85:3.5_0: But knowing that entering a village at the wrong time without taking leave had been prohibited by the Buddha and being afraid of wrongdoing, he declined.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc85:3.7_0: He then went to Sāvatthī and told the monks what had happened,
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc85:3.8_0: They in turn told the Buddha.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc85:3.9_0: After giving a teaching, the Buddha addressed the monks:
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc85:3.10_0: “Monks, I allow you to enter an inhabited area at the wrong time after taking leave of an available monk.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc85:3.11_0: “And, monks, this training rule should be recited like this:
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc85:3.12.1_0: ‘If a monk, when a monk is available, enters an inhabited area at the wrong time without taking leave of him, he commits an offense entailing confession.’”
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc85:3.13_0: In this way the Buddha laid down this training rule for the monks.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc85:4.1_0: Soon afterwards a monk was bitten by a snake.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc85:4.2_0: Another monk went to the village to get fire.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc85:4.4_0: But knowing that entering a village at the wrong time without taking leave of an available monk, being afraid of wrongdoing, he declined. ...
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc85:4.6_0: After giving a teaching, the Buddha addressed the monks:
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc85:4.7_0: “Monks, I allow you to enter an inhabited area at the wrong time without taking leave of an available monk if there is some appropriate urgent business.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc85:4.8_0: “And, monks, this training rule should be recited like this:
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc85:4.9.1_0: ‘If a monk, when a monk is available, enters an inhabited area at the wrong time without taking leave of an available monk, except if there is some appropriate urgent business, he commits an offense entailing confession.’”
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc85:5.1.4_0: ...The monk who has been given the full ordination by a unanimous Sangha through a legal procedure consisting of one motion and three announcements that is irreversible and fit to stand—this sort of monk is meant in this case.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc85:5.1.6_0: he is able to take leave of him and then enter.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc85:5.1.8_0: he is not able to take leave and then enter.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc85:5.1.10_0: when the middle of the day has passed, until dawn.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc85:5.1.12_0: if he crosses the boundary of an enclosed inhabited area, he commits an offense entailing confession.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc85:5.1.13_0: If she enters the vicinity of an unenclosed inhabited area, she commits an offense entailing confession.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc85:5.1.14_0: Except if there is some appropriate urgent business:
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc85:5.1.15_0: unless there is some appropriate urgent business.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc85:5.2.1_0: If it is the wrong time, and he perceives it as such, and he enters an inhabited area without taking leave of an available monk, except if there is some appropriate urgent business, he commits an offense entailing confession.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc85:5.2.2_0: If it is the wrong time, but he is unsure of it, and he enters an inhabited area without taking leave of an available monk, except if there is some appropriate urgent business, he commits an offense entailing confession.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc85:5.2.3_0: If it is the wrong time, but he perceives it as the right time, and he enters an inhabited area without taking leave of an available monk, except if there is some appropriate urgent business, he commits an offense entailing confession.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc85:5.2.4_0: If it is the right time, but he perceives it as the wrong time, he commits an offense of wrong conduct.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc85:5.2.5_0: If it is the right time, but he is unsure of it, he commits an offense of wrong conduct.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc85:5.2.6_0: If it is the right time, and he perceives it as such, there is no offense.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc85:5.3.1_0: there is no offense for him.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc85:5.3.2_0: if there is some appropriate urgent business;
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc85:5.3.3_0: if he enters after taking leave of an available monk;
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc85:5.3.4_0: if, when there is no available monk, he enters without taking leave;
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc85:5.3.5_0: if he is going between monasteries;
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc85:5.3.6_0: if he is going to the dwelling place of nuns;
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc85:5.3.7_0: if he is going to the dwelling place of the ascetics of another religion;
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc85:5.3.8_0: if he is returning to the monastery;
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc85:5.3.9_0: if the road goes via an inhabited area;
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc85:5.3.12_0: if he is the first offender.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc85:5.3.13_0: The third rule, the training rule on entering an inhabited area at the wrong time, is finished.
